Key Match Events: Quentin Grimes had 20 points, four rebounds, and two assists.
The Mavericks attempted a comeback but could only score 24 points in the third quarter compared to LA's 27.
The Mavericks were outscored 34-20 in the paint.
Pre-Game Insights: Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving were rested.
Klay Thompson went scoreless despite leading the Clippers.
The Mavericks had turnover troubles with Thompson accounting for four of them in the first half.
Post-Match Reflections: Thompson will look to put his torrid shooting struggle behind him.
The Mavericks will hope to finish their final preseason game against the Milwaukee Bucks with a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers came off a preseason win against the Brooklyn Nets and added another win to their kitty.
The Mavericks had 15 turnovers in the first half.
The LA Clippers played with all 10 players in their rotation scoring points.
